sentences.sentence: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
sentences.translation: 真正的朋友会在全世界与你为敌时站在你身边。

sentences.sentence: But don't worry , forgetting the trauma of childbirth is one of the great gifts of the universe.
sentences.translation: 但是不用担心，忘记创伤是宇宙赠与的礼物之一。

sentences.sentence: It must be nice to be back home.
He that will not allow his friends to share the prize must not expect him to share the danger.
sentences.translation: 不肯让朋友共享果实的人，不要指望朋友与他共患难。
